body.name: Acure Buildup Balancing Hemp & Apple Cider Vinegar Conditioner | 100% Vegan | Resets & Balances Hair for Styled, Swim & Harsh Conditions | Fragrance Free Formula | 8 Fl Oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 28 mins
features: OUR SOLUTION: Reset your hair’s balance with ph adjusting and clarifying ACV (Apple Cider Vinegar) and hemp seed oil.
PERFOMANCE DRIVEN HAIR CARE: Fragrance Free formula for sensitive noses and scalps.
100% VEGAN: Vegan and certified cruelty-free. Also Paraben free, Sulfate free, Mineral oil free, Petrolatum free and Formaldehyde free
DIRECTION: Apply to wet hair. Massage into scalp and hair, working through the ends. Rinse thoroughly.
body.description: OUR STORY: We are skin & hair wellness enthusiasts who believe in the power of purity to uplift the way you feel. We want to see every action you take lead to a stronger, healthier, more vibrant you that is ready to kick ass and take names. INGREDIENTS: We source the highest quality ingredients for your skin. No parabens, sulfates, formaldehyde, paraffin, mineral oil or animal testing allowed! SUPER POSITIVE EFFECT: Our products always uplift, for skin & hair that performs at its absolute best and a planet that flourishes. THOUGHTFUL INGENUITY: We mix together the perfect combination of super nutrients for powerful products. SHEER PASSION: We are on a mission to steer people toward better for you and accessible skin care & hair care that will allow them to shine their brightest. OUR MISSION is to take skin & hair from blah to brilliant by boosting their performance with powerful combination of amazing ingredients.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: No smell, great volume, cleansing. Usually use the green clarifying but switched to this for more regular use. Moisturizing my hair well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, super mild nice smell
reviews.reviewText: I’m cursed with tons of chemical sensitivities plus a massively over sensitive sense of smell. Suffice to say finding hair products is a challenge.I love this one so much. Not only does it work well, the smell is amazing. Most people probably wouldn’t smell much of anything, to me it has a lovely mild almost fruity smell that I find quite nice. It also doesn’t do that weird thing some conditioners do of leaving your hair smelling kind of like rancid oil. Once it’s washed out there is no smell at all.I absolutely recommend trying it if you’re like me and have any sort of fragrance sensitivities. If you don’t I still recommend trying it because it works great and you’ll help make the world a little bit safer for those of us who do!Emissions from the scents in personal care products in the morning rival the emission levels of rush hour traffic (seriously, the NOAA proved this in a study) so choosing something that doesn’t put those off is the kind choice for the planet too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really great product!
reviews.reviewText: I love this conditioner! It doesn’t leave that gross buildup feeling that other conditioners do even after you rinse forever, my hair feels really soft, and it doesn’t weigh down my hair! My only problem, and it’s really not much of a problem since I use a scented oil in my hair after, is the smell. It’s kind of tangy-sour. I don’t love it. It doesn’t linger after I dry my hair without any other products on it, but the faint sour scent stays in my hair while it’s wet. After it dries, it goes away, though. Other than that, it’s great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works so well on scalp, 100% recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The only conditioner I’ll use
reviews.reviewText: No buildup or greasy scalp with this conditioner just clean fresh hair & scalp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it and its safe!
reviews.reviewText: No scent and doesn't irritate my scalp like most shampoo/conditioner

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect - Soothing on Sensitive/Irritated Scalp
reviews.reviewText: ACURE - Buildup Balancing Hemp & ACV Conditioner;Soothing for very sensitive, irritated scalp on very first time using it (paired with Shampoo). After washing my hair and scalp feeling clean, and moisturized.I suffer with scaly psoriasis and my scalp feels refreshed with noticeably less scales and irritation. I’m impressed this helped sooth so quickly.This product is fragrance free which is what I wanted - Having said that the Conditioner does have a subtle scent that is very mild and is not offensive to me. Once hair is dried it just smells fresh and clean.Will continue to use and update any progress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Meh for me
reviews.reviewText: I like Acure products, but this one is a non-repeat for me. I Purchased both the shampoo and the conditioner twice and it did absolutely nothing for my dry, itchy scalp. I also have long, thick and wavy/curly hair and I did not find that the conditioner did much for that either.
